name: Heart Donor
description:
You can also use the IJKL keys instead of arrow keys for attacking

Dead? Rotting? Going to heaven? Ha! Like thats gonna stop you from wanting to go to hell!

In this game you play as the skeleton of someone who was supposed to go to heaven but instead wants to go to hell for some odd reason dont ask me, but for some reason he can only find hearts down here... so the obvious solution? Throw the hearts at people!

Theres 5 different hearts and 7 different enemies, and infinite levels! Compete for the highest score!
